subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Sean Casey, the first baseman for the Detroit Tigers, will probably miss the rest of the A.L.C.S. after tearing a muscle in his left calf during Game 1 on Tuesday night.
snippet: Sean Casey, the first baseman for the Detroit Tigers, will probably miss the rest of the A.L.C.S. after tearing a muscle in his left calf during Game 1 on Tuesday night.
